text: @UIH_Quality: "Show me the money" - How to market Infection Prevention and Antimicrobial Stewardship to the C-suite? #InfectionPrevention #AntimicrobialStewardship #Healthcare #QualityPatientCare"Marketing" infection prevention and antimicrobial stewardship to top executives can be a challenge. As a chief quality officer, assistant vice chancellor of quality and patient safety, and medical director of infection prevention and antimicrobial stewardship at UIH, I understand the importance of communicating the value of these programs effectively. My presentation at the Society of Epidemiology of America in Houston, Texas, will focus on creating a business plan for infection prevention and antimicrobial stewardship, with a lead-in of "show me the money." Join me to learn how teams can market their programs to secure the necessary support and resources.
